document_data.mainbody:
'''Aradin''' was an adventurer that lived in the [[Western Heartlands]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Open the bloody [[Emerald Grove|gates]]!|Aradin.}}
document_data.Description: Aradin had dark skin and dark, curly hair.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Aradin led the group of adventurers – the [[Beno Boys]]: [[Remira]], [[Barth (adventurer)|Barth]], [[Liam]], and [[Brian (dwarf)|Brian]], were hired by a [[Baldurian]] [[wizard]] to recover a treasure known as the ''[[Nightsong]]''.

During their travels, the group encountered the [[druid]] [[Halsin]], and together made their way to the ruined [[Selûnite]] temple known as the [[Shattered Sanctum]]. They were ambushed by a group of [[goblin]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultists]] led by [[Za'krug]], and driven back towards the gates of the [[Emerald Grove]]. By the time the [[tiefling]] [[Zevlor]] called his people to let the adventurers in, Za'krug's goblinoids came upon them.
